content: I am not your toy.
ugh. your so fake i bet if you look at the bottom of your foot it say made in china
I smile to the camera, I smile to my friends, I smile to my family, I smile to the world but I cry for myself.
If someone breaks your heart, just punch them in the face. Seriously. Punch them in faceand go get some ice-cream
Being grateful to those that harvest our garden of happiness makes our soul blossom.

Yeah You – The One Reading My Status, Get Lost!
Figure out how to esteem yourself which means battling for your satisfaction
LoVe ThE oNe WhO LoVeS YoU..... nOt ThE oNe WhOm YoU LoVe.
Whatever makes you feel bad, leave it. Whatever makes you smile, keep it.

Good girls are bad girls, who never get caught.
A real man can't stand seeing his woman hurt. He is careful with his decisions and actions so he never have to be responsible for her pain.
i m so sorry my love...
I work out everyday I do 1 sit-up every morning when I wake up.
The people who were once close to me, now act as complete strangers.
If I had one single wish… I would go back to the moment we kissed 🙁
For every minute you are angry….. you lose sixty seconds of happiness… Think about It
Sorry Vegetarians We Can’T Pretend.
I hate the moment when suddenly my anger turns into tears.
Sometimes a good cry in the shower, is All you need to release the pain that has build up inside !!
I’m take a nice long shit, so don’t stress me !
You will find a girl prettier than me, smarter than me, and funnier than me, but you will never find a girl just like me.

There are no words to describe the anger and frustration that I am feeling right now.
Stop letting the world change you. Be yourself and change the world.
What you heard is not what I said. Listen better next time.
There Is No Excuse For Cheating In A Relationship.
Sometimes you need to run away just to see who will follow you.
Some battles have to be fought alone,Some paths have to be crossed alone, so never be emotionally attached with anyone you never know when you have to walk alone.
If the relationship does not make you a better person… then you are with the wrong person.
My actions are before blinded eyes, my voice falls on deafened ears.
Things change, but the way you made me feel that never will.
Life seems to be running on a road without any shelter, without any sign board & without any destination. 🙁
Every day, I am acting like I am okay but you'll never know the truth.
What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise
Outward beautification needs a soul happiness expression to resonate.

I'm not her first but I will do anything to be her last. She is my one and only.
If I tell you "I love you" then I actually do love you.
If love is the best feeling in the world, then why does my heart hurt so much?
Dear heart, please fall in love only when you're ready, not when you're lonely.
I love it when you hold me like you will never let me go.
The bravest thing I ever did was continuing my life when I wanted to die.
As long as you are looking back on the past you will never see what's ahead in.

Seeing your ex go through what they put you through.. Priceless.
U Cant Switch Off Ur Feelings Just Because Other Person Did 💔💔
I wish I could give you my pain just for one moment. Not to hurt you but rather so you can finally understand, how much you hurt me.
Think again before you assume, And next time don’t be so quick to judge. You’ll never know what it’s like to be in my shoes.

I don’t regret my past. I just regret the time I have wasted with the wrong people.

wait for the boy that would do anything to be your everything .

In you i H've Found the love of my life and my closest, truest friend.
Some Friends Are Like Pennies. Two-Faced & Worthless.
Yes, I've changed. Pain does that to people.
“You told me I was perfect, but you still left. I should have known my perfect wouldn’t be good enough.”
Crying is how your heart speaks, when your lips can't explain the pain you feel.
Anger is temporary madness.

Not many wish to share in your misery, but all indulge in your happiness.

I preferred walking away than fighting for you not because you were not worth fighting for but because you never asked me to stay…
Don’t try to please other people if in the end, you know it won’t work.
One of the worst things that can happen to a person is to be forgotten by someone they will never forget.
If you love something set it free.
Love yourself first and everything else falls into line.
People change, things go wrong, shit happens, but life goes on.
Telling someone to calm down just makes them so much angrier.

No one has ever loved anyone the way everyone wants to be loved.
A hug for you means I need you. A kiss for you means I love you. A call for you means I’m missing you.
The past is gone; the future is not yet here, so we need to embrace the present.
Bad relationship change good people.
Second chances are only meant for those who learned from the first time.
Tum mujhe ‘Hmmm’ do, main tumhe ‘K’ dunga
Don’T Be So Happy, I Don’T Really Forgive People, I Just Pretend Like It’S OK And Wait For My Turn To Destroy Them.
"“If you judge people, you have no time to love them.” - Mother Teresa"
My silence is just another word for my PAIN.
OK for those who are wondering… NO! I’m NOT OK!.. I have NOT been for a while… I wont be for a long time…
Jealousy is just Love and Hate at the same Time
Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
Success is largely a matter of holding on after others have let go
Feelings are much like waves, we can’t stop them from coming but we can choose which ones to surf.
Everything is getting expensive except some people, they are getting cheaper…

To keep a relationship, you must keep your business to yourself and your partner, The whole world doesnt need to know your problems.

Next time when you think about a wonderful & beautiful thing in life, don't forget to include YOURSELF in it.

Without pain, you will not know happiness.
The strong man is not the good wrestler, the strong man is, only the one who controls himself when he is angry.

I Am Me And I Won’T Change Myself For Anyone.
Sometimes, its not the person you miss, its the feelings, moments and memories you had with them.

Watching PK… After PK..!!
Happiness is not limited in one direction and spreads to all life quarters.
I MISS YOU. A little too much, a little too often, and a little more every day.
Each day is a new beginning, a new chapter to start afresh in a new spark. Forget about what did not happen or focus on what can be.
You fall in love, you get hurt. That’s life.

Every girl needs a good guy to help her laugh when she thinks she'll never smile again.
It hurts when you realize you aren't as important to someone as you thought you were.
Sometimes I want to treat people how they treat me But I don’t because It’s out of my character.
Happiness sparks off once one has mind settled but then sparks all over in random spurts.
No calls, no texts, nothing but i am still here thinking about you like crazy.
When I miss you, I read our old conversation, smile like an idiot, listen to songs that remind me of you, Then miss you more
I had a lot of reasons to give up on you. But I still chose to stay. You had a lot of reasons to stay. But you chose to give up…
I dont have enough middle fingers to show you how i feel.
Silence .. because that’s the only thing you deserve from me now.
The greatest gift to those who love us is simply being happy.
Anger blows out the lamp of the mind.
The true cosmetic for beauty is happiness.
People change, things go wrong, shit happens, but life goes on.
My real smile comes out when i am with you ♥

If you want to hear the whole truth about yourself, make your neighbor angry.
Questioning what brings happiness is difficult to answer. Wealth has failed. Poverty has failed. Sadness and happiness are parallel trails. Each time you pause, one of them intervene your space.
Don’t fade away precious moments making up your mind about being happy. It is about letting go!
Accept that some days you are the pigeon, and some days you are the statue.

Seriously boys dont understand how much a little word or move can affect a girl.

Dear broken hearted girls , Hold your head up high and you middle finger higher , let him know what he is missing
Happiness is not ruined in moments of great catastrophes but a repetition of minute habits.
Never, never, never, never give up.
Some people need to open their small minds instead of their big mouths.

if you want me let me know, if you dont, please gently let me go.

You fall in love, you get hurt. That’s life.
Deep inside my heart, I still feel I need someone to love and care.
A magic of songs and sound, When you are happy you just listen the song, but when you are sad you understand the song…
Be yourself because an original is worth more than a copy.

Dear Girls, Stop comparing all guys with your ex. Not all of us are players and jerks.
Follow your heart and see where you land.
Where there is love, Nothing is missing.
Dont promise me the moon or the stars, just promise you will stay under them with me forever.
Don’t waste your tears crying over someone who doesn’t even deserve to see you smile.
